title: Madden's Story Mode Is Actually Amazing   Kinda Funny Gamescast Ep  132

Thanks to Blue Apron for sponsoring this episode. Go to http://www.Blueapron.com/Gamescast

Andy Cortez joins us to discuss Madden's story mode, Uncharted Lost Legacy, Sonic Mania, and more. (Released first to Patreon Supporters on 08.18.17)

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.
